item.title: 如何使用 Golang 的 Interface
item.description: I occasionally give free Go consults and code review on top of my daily work. As such, I tend to read a lot of other peoples’ codes. And while this is really more of a feeling *, I’ve seen an increase in what I call “Java-style” interface usage. This
